name: go_todo
description: This is a simple **Todo List API** built with Go. The application allows users to manage their tasks through a RESTful API. It supports operations such as creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting tasks. The tasks are stored in a JSON file (`data/todos.json`).

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css
